00029 //  for an explanation why this two-stage macro expansion generates string
00030 //  literals from #defines, see
00031 //  http://groups.google.de/group/comp.lang.c/browse_thread/thread/2016d4664fdae3c1/f2873d4f6ef769b9#f2873d4f6ef769b9
00032 #define stringify(X) #X
00033 #define make_str(X) stringify(X)

00069             background[0] = r;
00070             background[1] = g;
00071             background[2] = b;

00092         }
00093 
00094         void glVertex (VecMath::Vector<3> &V) {
00095             if (__finite (V.sqnorm ()))
00096                glVertex3dv (V.data ());
00097         }
00098 
00099         VecMath::Vector<3> vnormalize (double xx, double yy, double zz);
00100 
00101         template <typename T> void Swap (T &a, T &b) {
00102             T temp (a);
00103             a = b;
00104             b = temp;
00105         }
